keyword: how many calories in a red bull energy drink
title: How Many Calories in a Red Bull Energy Drink?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Red Bull energy drink (standard 8.4 oz can), including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like sugar-free.
h1: How Many Calories in a Red Bull Energy Drink?
assumptions: Standard 8.4 fl oz (250 ml) original Red Bull can, unflavored, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and brand formulations; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 8.4 oz Red Bull energy drink has 110 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 oz vodka (for a mixed drink)
Use low-sugar edition (e.g., Red Bull Light)

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard Red Bull?
Are there carbs in Red Bull energy drink?
faqs.a: Yes, 27 g of carbs, all from sugars, per can.

faqs.q: How much sugar in a Red Bull?
faqs.a: About 27 g of sugars per standard can.

faqs.q: Does Red Bull have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0 g protein and 0 g fat per can.
